sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script for Procurement Common Architecture</description>
        <name>Dictionary Upgrade (Nov 2022 Release)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=purchasing_user_attribute',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Send approval to purchasing users(deprecated)'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=purchasing_user',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Purchasing user(deprecated)'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=detail_object',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Approving line',
			'read_only' : true
        }
    },
   {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approving_object',
        'attribute': {
            'mandatory': true,
			'attributes':'base_start=true,tableChoicesScript=ApprovalMappingUtil',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approval_routing_method',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Approval sequence'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approval_trigger',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Approval trigger conditions'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approval_decision_method',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Approval required from'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approval_required',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Send approval request to'
        }
    },

    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_plan^element=approval_record_id',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Purchase requisition number(deprecated)'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_plan^element=lines_list',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Purchase requisition line(s)(deprecated)'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approved_purchasing_limit',
        'attribute': {
			'column_label': 'Approval limit',
        }
    },
	{
		'query': 'nameINsn_shop_sourcing_activity,sn_shop_negotiation_event,sn_shop_negotiation,sn_shop_purchase_requisition,sn_shop_acknowledgement_task,sn_shop_invoice_task,sn_shop_receipt_task,sn_shop_milestone,sn_shop_task,sn_shop_erp_error_task,sn_shop_delivery_address_task,sn_shop_approval_reminder_task,sn_shop_sourcing_task^internal_type=collection^active=true',
		'attribute': {
			'attributes': 'email_client=true'
		}
	}					 
];

var docArr = [{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=detail_object',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Approving line',
            'plural': 'Approving lines',
            'hint': 'Line items of the approving object that define the triggers for an approval request'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approval_routing_method',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Approval sequence',
            'plural': 'Approval sequence',
            'hint': 'Determines whether approval requests are sent all at once or one at a time'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approval_trigger',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Approval trigger conditions',
            'plural': 'Approval trigger conditions',
            'hint': 'Conditions that the object details need to meet for an approval request to be sent out'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approval_decision_method',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Approval required from',
            'plural': 'Approval required from',
            'hint': 'Determines whether all approvers or just one needs to approve'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approval_required',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Send approval request to',
            'plural': 'Send approval request to',
            'hint': 'People who will receive an approval request'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=name',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'Name of this approval rule'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=number',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'A system-generated number used to identify this approval rule'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=active',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'If selected, this rule will be used to request approvals'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approving_object',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'The type of item that needs approval'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=users',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'People who can approve this object'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=groups',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'Groups that can approve this object'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=job_level',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'The highest job level an approval request will be sent to'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=rule_type',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'Determines how approvals will be requested'
        }
     },
	{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=authorized_job_codes',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'Job codes of those who can approve this object'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_approval_rule^element=approved_purchasing_limit',
        'attribute': {
			'label': 'Approval limit',
            'plural': 'Approval limits',
            'hint': 'The maximum amount that can be approved by the authorized job codes'
        }
    }
];

var choiceArr = [
    {
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice^value=90',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Closed Rejected'
        }
        },
        {
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_purchase_line^value=rejected',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Rejected',
			'sequence' : '170'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice_line^value=20',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '50'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice_line^value=40',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '60'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice_line^value=50',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '70'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice_line^value=60',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '40'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice_line^value=70',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '90'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_purchase_line^value=approved',
        'attribute': {
			'sequence' : '160'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_purchase_line^value=pending_approval',
        'attribute': {
			'sequence' : '5'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice^value=20',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '70'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice^value=30',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '50'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice^value=40',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '80'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice^value=50',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '85'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice^value=70',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '60'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_shop_invoice^value=80',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '30'
        }
    }
];
function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}

function updateDocumentation(docObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(docObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, docObj.attribute);
}

function updateChoice(ChoiceObj) {
    var choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    choiceGr.addEncodedQuery(ChoiceObj.query);
    choiceGr.query();
    while (choiceGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(choiceGr, ChoiceObj.attribute);
}

dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);
docArr.forEach(updateDocumentation);
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-07-27 01:01:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>02221e7b77709110b3f3dbe5ba5a9901</sys_id>

        <sys_package display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_scope>

        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-19 07:00:18</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
